profile:
Canada's leading supplier of stunning river-reclaimed, wide plank flooring. Browse through our hardwood flooring selections and start imagining Logs End elegance in your home.

You can view the beautiful Logs End flooring collections from the comfort of your home. Request our brochure, download our PDF or review our products online.

Logs End has a zero waste policy for all lumber harvested. We are committed to environmentally sound retrieval of lost timber and are proud members of the Canadian Green Building Council.

Logs End salvages timber lost during historic log drives on the Ottawa river and its tributaries. Recovered logs are milled into lumber, hardwood flooring, paneling, posts, beams, and mouldings. 

The quality of the old growth is evident, with rich patinas and timeless beauty. Species offered include Eastern White Pine, Red Pine, Red Oak, White Oak, Hemlock, Basswood, Birch, Maple, European Oak, and Engineered Hardwood.  Logs End is SmartWood "Rediscovered" Certified and we also offer barn board beams for mantles and other projects.
